Configure the System Log Server

Use this task to configure Northbound sytem log (syslog) server connectivity to the PW EMS.

  1. From the navigation bar, click Settings > System.
  2. In the System Settings window, click Syslog Servers, and complete the following fields:

    Field

    Description
    IPv4 Address field

    Enter the IP version 4 address of the syslog server.
    Port field

    The defualt syslog port is 80. If you need to change the default, enter a logical port with a minimum value of 1 and maximum value of 65535 for this server.
Parent topic: Manage System Settings for Devices
